name: Scary Monsters
description:
A Young Boy need to survive a long night alone, because his parents gone to the happy hour, help this poor boy to fight with his fears.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
Left Mouse - Shoot
R Or Right Mouse - Recharge Weapon
WASD - Move
SPACE - Active
ESC - Pause Game
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
